page.title: 13A DAY IN MY LIFE 3
page.content: After I have finished my tea, I get ready for Mosque. I leave my house at about 4.40, and reach Mosque at 4.45. At Mosque we learn about our prophet, Mohammed. We learn the Quran too. We also write and read Urdu. At 7.00 I go home and have my supper which is usually chappatti with spinach or Halal meat. My mother insists that I should read my reading book instead of doing the dishes. When I have finished reading I play Hangman or chess until we are tired, and then I go to bed, usually about 10.00. By Gulshain Hussain (age 11)
